alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 6:29AM CST until January 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow with total accumulations of up to 1 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Douglas County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snow totals will be found over far northern portions of the county, along the Lake Superior shore, including the city of Superior and Oliver.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
